channel.title: || 194 Server RuneScape Re-Make || Need Suggestions ||
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape,
Im Currently Still Making My Server Called 'EuroScape'. Im Going To Be Releasing It To You Guys When Its Almost Completed, But There Is One Stop In My Development.
Ive Done A Bit Of Research As I Did For My First 194-289 Release And I Found All The Gameframe And The Side Icons And Welcome Screen Ext.
I Need Some Suggestions To Further Up The Server Because I Dont Remember RuneScape 194-289 Its Self So I Need Your Help.
Keep A Look Out In The Downloads Section And See If You Can Get The Download, Comment Your Suggestions Below And / Or eMail Me At: BentonScape@Hotmail.co.uk.
[size=12pt]Rep++ For A Client I Can Use That Is Perfect For 194-289 Servers eMail Me Link Or Post Below Please![/size]
Thank You I Will Be Given Some Rep++ For The Best Ideas. :)
Anyways Heres Some Developments Ive Donee :) Not Started Yet Not Completed Yet Completed 100%
1.Welcome Screen 2.All Skills Working 3.Player Rights 4.Full Trading System 5.Full 2006 Pking / PvP Zones 6.RuneScape NPCs 7.RuneScape Combat System 8.Added Dragon Platebody 9.Full NPC Drops 10.Two Worlds 11.Packaged The Server
Thanks For Reading More Coming Soon And I Will Release Soon, Just Need Some Ideas And A Good Client, Rep++ For Them.
